body.name: CGBOOM Scented Markers Set with Cute Pencil Case for Kids, 40 Counts Paint Markers as Art Supplies and Creativity Gift to Girls, Colored Markers Set bonus Adorable Animals Stickers for School
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 1 hr 35 mins
features: 🖌️ A marker set meets kids' requirements: Up to 40 counts of coloring markers kit: 6*scented marker, 12*acrylic paint pen, 8*washable whiteboard marker, 12*twistable crayon, and 2*gel pen. One marker set can satisfy most of your child's drawing and coloring needs.

🎒 Multi-purpose pencil bag for easy organizing: The exquisite pencil bag makes it easy to collect and organize all markers, with the detachable strap not only making the markers set easy to carry but also turning this cute little horse pencil bag into a multi-purpose satchel!

🦄 Cute animals accompany the creative process: In addition to the cute little horse on the pencil case, a variety of cute animal designs appear on the stickers included with the crayon set, making the process of creating art even more fun for cute animal lovers!
🎁 Customized gifts for your little artist: As the tools that little artists need to get their creative juices flowing, these art supplies are the perfect gift to inspire their creativity!
💚 Non-toxic creative space: Safety-certified and non-toxic markers bulk suitable for children aged 4 years and above, to make a great creation environment for the future artist's initiation stage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars El mejor regalo
reviews.reviewText: Trae tantas cosas de calidad que es excelente regalo hasta para un adulto. 💛🙏🏽 Buen regalo para maestras, psicólogas, consejeras, escritoras, dibujantes, lectoras, journaling, niñas, adultas. No importa la edad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value set. Gorgeous fun carry case.
reviews.reviewText: I think the pencil case is the best part of this set. It's so sweet and perfect for a 6yr old. It comes with a neat cross body carry strap. My daughter loves taking this case with her on road trips. It's a must have on those days her brother is busy with a piano lesson or jujitsu. It's a very well organized case too, which makes it so much easier for her to find which coloring tools she wants.The markers work very well and produce strong bold colors. The twistable crayons are much preferred to regular ones that break after the first use. The scented markers have a faint but pleasant scent. Maybe my sense of smell isn't good, but it's difficult for me to distinguish between the various scents.Overall, everything included works well. The stickers are a nice bonus. I think this set is very good value for the price. It would also make an excellent gift for someone. I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect marker set
reviews.reviewText: This set comes with so many markers for my little one. Great quality and love that it comes with a travel size bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice set for your little unicorn loving artist. I did get this as a backup gift. I host a Christmas Eve party that is open to anyone who has nowhere else to be, so every year I get an extra family or 2 who stop by. I like to keep extra gifts on hand so when Santa comes, every kid gets a gift, not just my family members. This is great because it will cover a decent range of children, I'd say at least 4-7 years old. It has all types of color utensils (luckily I have extra lap white boards I can add to this), stickers, and although it technically has coloring sheets....they are not great. I will probably add a cute coloring book to round out this gift. The carrying case is nice, the zipper works. I'm happy with this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was very excited to get this pencil case for my kiddos, and to my disappointment it was poorly made, and it not double zippered as advertised

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel
reviews.reviewText: This comes with a cute travel case for kids. You can use it as a school penicil case as well as it has detachable strap, but with the strap, it should be great for travel! It comes with stickers, crayons, pens, scented markers, paint pens and washable markers. A great set for young kids who love to color. And once the markers run out of ink, simply replace them and continue to use the case. I can definitely recommend this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A good assortment of markers and crayons
reviews.reviewText: First of all, the description uses the word horse several times. They are really unicorns. I think my 5-year old niece will enjoy these. They will be a fun addition to her coloring books that she loves already. They also describe the case as a bag, but it is actually a sturdy case made of the rubber-feeling plastic. It is divided into two sections and will hold a little more than the 28 markers, 12 crayons, stickers, and cute little coloring book that is about 3"x3" with maybe 4-6 pages.I took a star off because I opened a couple of each of the markers, and although they wrote great, I wasn't sure which of them were the ones that were scented.
